<onlyinclude>
=== sScriptSourceFolder ===
* '''Default:''' <Code>".\Data\Scripts\Source\User"</Code>

This setting tells the editor where to put new script source files, as well as one of the locations to use when loading and compiling script source.
It may be an absolute or relative path.
If relative, it is relative to the editor's folder.
</onlyinclude>
